item.title: 波音达成 100 亿美元信贷协议以增强资产负债表
item.description: 波音公司签署了一项价值 100 亿美元的信贷协议，以巩固其资产负债表，并抵御已使其西雅图制造中心关闭一个月之久的长期罢工。【原文：Boeing Co. entered a $10 billion credit agreement as it seeks to shore up its balance sheet and withstand a prolonged strike that has shut down its Seattle manufacturing hub for a month.】

item.title: 股市重现泡沫。美国银行称其为卖出信号
item.description: 人工智能股票正在飙升。比特币突破 65000 美元。就连特朗普媒体也在重新飙升。根据美国银行（Bank of America）最新的基金经理调查显示，市场泡沫的所有迹象都回来了。10 月份的调查结果显示，投资者的乐观情绪创下了自 2020 年 6 月大流感爆发以来的最大涨幅。股票投资激增，债券投资减少，现金水平从9月份的4.2%降至3.9%。有迹象表明，美国经济正在强劲增长，这助长了市场的看涨热潮。【原文：AI stocks are roaring. Bitcoin is above $65,000. Even Trump Media is surging anew. All the signs of market froth are coming back, according to Bank of America’s latest fund manager survey. Investor optimism registered the biggest jump since the depths of the pandemic in June 2020, the October responses showed. Allocations to stocks surged, bond exposure sank and cash levels fell to 3.9% from 4.2% in September. The bullish fever is being fanned by signs that the US economy is powering ahead as th】

item.title: 调查称，哈里斯或特朗普执政时的通胀和国内生产总值将相同
item.description: 无论卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）还是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选，美国的通胀和经济增长前景都将大致相同，不过彭博社调查显示，经济学家们认为副总统在整体经济方面更有优势。【原文：The outlook for inflation and growth in the US would be roughly the same whether Kamala Harris or Donald Trump wins the election, though economists in a Bloomberg survey give the vice president the edge on the economy overall.】

item.title: 看跌利率押注让巴西饱受打击的对冲基金获胜
item.description: 对国内资产的悲观情绪使巴西对冲基金在 9 月份取得了罕见的胜利。【原文：Pessimism with domestic assets earned Brazilian hedge funds a rare win in September.】

item.title: 世界银行顶级经济学家称尼日利亚奈拉几十年来最具竞争力
item.description: 尼日利亚的货币是几十年来最便宜的，这要归功于为使国家走上长期复苏之路而进行的痛苦但必要的经济改革。【原文：Nigeria’s currency is the cheapest that it has been in decades, thanks to painful but necessary economic reforms to put the nation on a long-term path to recovery.】

item.title: 印度央行副行长预计明年消费物价指数将在 "持久基础 "上实现目标
item.description: 印度央行副行长迈克尔-帕特拉（Michael Patra）表示，印度的通货膨胀率可能会在下一个财政年度 "持久地 "向4%的目标迈进。【原文：India’s inflation will likely move toward the 4% target on a “durable basis” in the coming fiscal year, the central bank’s Deputy Governor Michael Patra said.】

item.title: 中国落后于其他新兴市场，刺激政策疑虑引发分歧
item.description: 中国以外的新兴市场股市连续第六天上涨，尽管上海和香港股市受到投资者的打压，投资者担心迄今为止宣布的刺激措施不足以重振世界第二大经济体。【原文：Stocks in emerging markets outside China rose for a sixth day, even as equities in Shanghai and Hong Kong were pummeled by investors worried that stimulus measures announced so far won’t be enough to revive the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心自 6 月以来首次上升
item.description: 投资者对德国经济的信心四个月来首次有所增强，原因是借贷成本下降的速度有望超过此前的预期。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy improved for the first time in four months on the prospect that borrowing costs will fall more quickly than previously anticipated.】

item.title: 欧洲官员称 T+1 过渡亟待开展工作
item.description: 欧盟监管机构周二表示，加快欧盟金融市场的发展应成为当务之急，因为他们希望赶上大西洋彼岸的同行。【原文：Speeding up the European Union’s financial markets should be an urgent priority, the bloc’s regulators said Tuesday, as they look to catch up with peers across the Atlantic.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示全球股市乐观情绪闪现卖出信号
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一项投资者调查显示，投资者越来越看好全球股市，也许是时候卖出全球股市了。【原文：Investors are getting so bullish that it might be time to sell global stocks, according to an investor survey by Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 马来西亚投资银行（Khazanah）寻求吸引基金经理进驻马来西亚，推动风险投资发展
item.description: 马来西亚主权财富基金马来西亚国有有限公司（Khazanah Nasional Bhd.【原文：Malaysia’s sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional Bhd. is launching initiatives to support local venture capital funds and attract international managers, in a boost to its efforts to become a venture capital hub by 2030.】

item.title: 瑞银对冲基金 40 亿美元押注兼并与资产交易复兴
item.description: 今年对于兼并套利市场来说是艰难的一年，由于一系列大交易受到监管障碍的影响，兼并套利市场在对冲基金策略中回报率最差。一些基金经理已经完全退出了这一交易。【原文：It’s been a tough year for the merger-arbitrage market, which is delivering some of the worst returns across hedge-fund strategies as a slew of big deals have been roiled by regulatory hurdles. Some money managers have exited the trade entirely.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 获得 Chips Act 和 Apollo 15 亿美元融资
item.description: 主要用于电动汽车的芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 公司有望获得 7.5 亿美元的美国政府拨款，以及由阿波罗全球管理公司牵头的 7.5 亿美元融资，以支持其工厂扩张计划。【原文：Wolfspeed Inc., a manufacturer of chips used primarily in electric vehicles, is in line to win $750 million in US government grants as well as $750 million in financing led by Apollo Global Management Inc. to support its factory expansion plans.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数期货交易量蒸发，记录下降
item.description: S&P 500 指数可能正在刷新纪录，但并没有伴随着高成交量的信念。相反，交易量让人感觉无人问津，即使财报季即将拉开帷幕，充满争议的总统投票也近在眼前。【原文：The S&P 500 may be punching through fresh records, but it hasn’t been accompanied by high turnover conviction. On the contrary, trading volumes make it feel like no one’s around, even with earnings season kicking off and a fraught presidential vote just round the corner.】

item.title: 乌干达计划建造价值 6 亿美元的铁路线
item.description: 乌干达计划修建一条铁路线，将东部的一个城镇与维多利亚湖上的一个拟建港口连接起来，总投资达 6 亿美元，这将为通过坦桑尼亚通往印度洋提供更好的物流连接。【原文：Uganda plans to build a rail line linking a town in the east to a proposed port on Lake Victoria for a combined $600 million, which will provide better logistics links through Tanzania to the Indian Ocean.】

item.title: 埃尼集团正就新碳捕集装置的股份与收购方谈判
item.description: 意大利石油天然气巨头埃尼公司（Eni SpA）正在与投资者洽谈出售其计划分拆的新碳捕集与封存部门的股份，该公司对其他两个部门也采取了同样的做法。【原文：Eni SpA is in talks with investors to sell a stake in a new carbon capture and storage division it plans to spin off, as the Italian oil and gas major has done with other two units.】

item.title: 英国货币印刷商德拉鲁因 3.92 亿美元的分拆计划而飙升
item.description: De La Rue Plc 的股价在伦敦交易市场大涨，原因是这家陷入困境的英国印钞公司同意将其认证部门出售给美国的 Crane NXT Co.公司，从而实现分拆，这将缩减其债务，缓解其养老金赤字。【原文：De La Rue Plc shares surged in London trading after the beleaguered British banknote printer agreed to sell its authentication arm to Crane NXT Co. of the US, precipitating a breakup that will shrink its debt pile and ease its pension deficit.】

item.title: ASML 依靠人工智能相关订单使股价从夏季跌势中回升
item.description: 在经历了一个动荡的夏天之后，ASML Holding NV 的投资者们希望其财报能够凸显出这家芯片设备制造商作为人工智能交易商的强大实力，并希望它能走得更远。【原文：After a volatile summer, ASML Holding NV investors are hoping that its earnings report will underline the chip equipment maker’s strong credentials as an artificial intelligence trade with further to run.】

item.title: 福国生命认为日本央行加息将使日本国债收益率接近目标值
item.description: Fukoku Mutual Life Insurance Co. 公司认为，日本央行在 3 月底之前最多将加息两次，并计划在合适的条件下投资日本的超长期国债。【原文：Fukoku Mutual Life Insurance Co. sees the Bank of Japan raising interest rates as many as two times before the end of March, and plans to invest in the nation’s super-long government bonds under the right conditions.】

item.title: 欧元区企业贷款需求自 2022 年以来首次上升
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的数据显示，欧元区银行的企业信贷需求自 2022 年以来首次出现增长，这对该地区苦苦挣扎的经济来说是一个难得的利好消息。【原文：Banks in the euro area saw credit demand from companies increase for the first time since 2022, according to the European Central Bank – a rare positive note for the region’s struggling economy.】

item.title: LVMH 将为奢侈品行业在中国的困境提供线索
item.description: 对于正在为欧洲奢侈品行业又一个黯淡的业绩季做准备的投资者来说，有一个潜在的亮点，那就是中国的经济刺激政策，这可能会促使企业发出盈利即将触底的信号。【原文：For investors bracing for another gloomy results season from Europe’s luxury-goods industry, there’s potentially one bright spot — China’s stimulus blitz, which could prompt companies to signal that earnings are approaching the bottom.】

item.title: 欧洲股市追随华尔街涨势，屡创新高
item.description: 欧洲股市开盘走高，与最高纪录水平相距不远，追随华尔街科技股的涨势。【原文：European stocks opened higher and within striking distance of their peak record levels as they tracked a tech-fueled rally on Wall Street.】

item.title: 芬玛称瑞银将因收购修改应急计划
item.description: 金融监管机构 Finma 表示，考虑到瑞士信贷的整合，瑞银集团必须修订其应急计划，确保在危机中能够安全地停业。【原文：UBS Group AG must revise its emergency planning and ensure it can be safely wound down in a crisis, taking account of the integration of Credit Suisse, financial supervisor Finma said.】

item.title: 印度推出价值 1090 亿美元的绿色能源传输计划
item.description: 印度电力部公布了一项电网改造计划，以适应 2032 年前可再生能源的大规模扩张。【原文：India’s power ministry unveiled a plan to revamp its power grid to accommodate a large renewable expansion through 2032.】

item.title: 铜价跌至三周低点，因中国问题引发新的担忧情绪
item.description: 由于对中国政府推动经济增长的政策会对需求产生多大影响心存疑虑，基本金属也加入了中国风险资产的抛售行列。【原文：Base metals joined a selloff across Chinese risk assets on doubts over how much impact the government’s pro-growth push will have on demand.】

item.title: 以色列考虑美国警告，欧洲天然气价格跟随石油走低
item.description: 有报道称，以色列在对伊朗最近的一次袭击进行报复时，愿意避免打击石油和核目标，此后欧洲天然气价格暴跌。【原文：European natural gas prices slumped after a report that Israel is willing to avoid striking oil and nuclear targets when it retaliates against Iran for a recent attack.】

item.title: 中国考虑以 8530 亿美元债务互换拯救地方政府
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国正在考虑允许地方政府在2027年前发行多达6万亿元人民币（约合8530亿美元）的债券，主要用于为其资产负债表外债务再融资，这是中国政府支撑世界第二大经济体计划的关键部分。【原文：China is considering allowing local authorities to issue as much as 6 trillion yuan ($853 billion) in bonds through 2027 mainly to refinance their off-balance-sheet debt, people familiar with the matter said, a key part of the government’s plan to shore up the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 应用营养公司在伦敦首次公开募股中寻求高达 2.87 亿美元的投资
item.description: 应用营养公司（Applied Nutrition）正寻求在其首次公开募股中筹集高达 2.2 亿英镑（2.87 亿美元）的资金，这可能是伦敦今年最大的首次股票销售之一。【原文：Applied Nutrition is seeking to raise as much as £220 million ($287 million) in its initial public offering, in what could be one of London’s largest first-time share sales this year.】

item.title: 阿托斯任命菲利普-萨勒自 2021 年起担任第七任首席执行官
item.description: Atos SE任命商人菲利普-萨勒（Philippe Salle）为其约三年内的第七位首席执行官，这家陷入困境的法国IT公司正在与债权人进行重组。【原文：Atos SE named businessman Philippe Salle as its seventh chief executive officer in about three years as the troubled French IT company navigates its way through a restructuring with its creditors.】

item.title: 荷兰计划将荷兰银行持股比例降至约 30
item.description: 作为退出荷兰银行计划的一部分，荷兰政府打算将其在荷兰银行的持股比例降至约 30%。【原文：The Dutch government intends to pare its holding in ABN Amro Bank NV to about 30% as part of its plan to pull out from the lender.】
